data.message: Fix 4 FTS rows missing semantic text: Root cause: new artifact types (incident_rca, recent_change, checklist_template, design_reference) not handled in artifact_to_text() and _extract_title(). Fixed by adding handlers to both embeddings.py and index.py. Reindexed 4 affected artifacts. FTS coverage now 100%. Committed 48e02ef.
data.task: Fix 4 FTS rows missing semantic text
data.outcome: Root cause: new artifact types (incident_rca, recent_change, checklist_template, design_reference) not handled in artifact_to_text() and _extract_title(). Fixed by adding handlers to both embeddings.py and index.py. Reindexed 4 affected artifacts. FTS coverage now 100%. Committed 48e02ef.
